text: 最終コーナーで後ろの方にいると近くの\nウマ娘を見て持久力をわずかに回復する
"translation": <size=22>If you're in the back during the last corner, your endurance recovers slightly</size>

text: レース終盤に前方が詰まると\nお告げ次第で道をわずかに切り開く
"translation": <size=22>Slightly easier to find an opening if blocked at the front in Final Leg</size>

text: レース終盤で3番手の時に負けそうに\nなると速度がわずかに上がる
"translation": <size=22>When you're in 3rd place at the end of the race and about to lose, your speed slightly increases</size>

text: レースを冷静に運ぶことができると残り\n200mで実力発揮、速度が少し上がる
"translation": <size=22>After proceeding through the race calmly, your speed increases a little during the last 200m</size>

text: 最終直線で前の方で追いすがっていると\n速度がわずかに上がる
"translation": <size=22>Slightly increase speed in the last straight when chasing someone close to the lead</size>

text: 最終コーナー以降に前めで力が尽きかけ\n詰め寄られると速度がわずかに上がる
"translation": <size=22>Slightly increase speed after the last corner when stamina runs out being one of the lead</size>

text: レース中盤で前の方から\n仕掛け始める時に速度がわずかに上がる
"translation": <size=22>Slightly increase speed in Middle Leg when overtaking someone close to lead</size>

text: 最終コーナーで前の方で抜くと速度が後\nろの方で抜くと加速力がわずかに上がる
"translation": <size=22>On last corner, slightly gain speed when passing in front or acceleration when passing in back</size>
